Reviews.Title: Wrong name
Reviews.Author: Techguy
Reviews.Content: The title of this is pc wireless camera system Kinda hard to be wireless when you have to hook up each camera to the receiver that makes it wired Get it right and change the name tired of looking for wireless cameras and these show up

Reviews.Title: Very Bad Product
Reviews.Author: Peteamann
Reviews.Content: This item has many issues, but i"ll start with the connection. the receiver & cameras dont seem to want to link with one another, out of the 4 camers that come with this item i've only have 2 cameras that have linked with the receiver, and the other 2 have so much static in the video, its impossible to see anything, also, the 2 that are linked in are no better, What a waste, cameras are not far from the receiver and it doesnt work as describted... Saqve your money???

Reviews.Title: wireless 4 camera security for the home
Reviews.Author: Anthony Harris
Reviews.Content: when properly installed work exceptionally good have a little flicker sometime great color and able to select from 1-4 cameras with the base control see very well with little or no light, easily hidden  and most of all  you dont have to open the door to see who is there  but they dont know they are on camera  no mistaken who is at your door you see them about 50 feet away, best thing i bought for security for my home and garagethe only thing i dont like about them is the hard  wiring of themi recommend them for anyone that is looking to keep an eye on things and door its amazing how good they work at your doors, some one knocking at the door late at night, all you have to do is look at the screen and see exactly who it is  then decide if you want to open it

Reviews.Title: title is misleading
Reviews.Author: Wayne Hamilton
Reviews.Content: The title includes the term "DVR", but this product does NOT include a DVR!It is just 4 cameras and a receiver.I tried to give it zero stars, but Amazon replies "please rate this item".I'll give it one star to shut Amazon up.

Reviews.Title: not what i'd envisioned
Reviews.Author: Jon doe
Reviews.Content: This camera system is more for a hobbyist or child, than it is for providing actual security. Not at all what i'd been hoping for when i bought it.
